### LLVMGetBitcodeModuleInContext() {#gad617205cd3fbbb1ad78e6f79f9ce0e4b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMBool LLVMGetBitcodeModuleInContext (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga9c43e01525516ff6b4feab5166c5b1da">LLVMContextRef</a> ContextRef, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga9867eaa7b17ba17405cdf2539bedb108">LLVMMemoryBufferRef</a> MemBuf, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad1d1bb5f901c903a0cf09c5a053c9c56">LLVMModuleRef</a> &#42; OutM, char &#42;&#42; OutMessage)</>}>
Reads a module from the specified path, returning via the OutMP parameter a module provider which performs lazy deserialization.

Returns 0 on success. Optionally returns a human-readable error message via OutMessage. This is deprecated. Use LLVMGetBitcodeModuleInContext2.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/bitreader-h/#l00060">60</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/bitreader-h">BitReader.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/reader/bitreader-cpp/#l00077">77</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/reader/bitreader-cpp">BitReader.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMGetBitcodeModuleInContext2() {#ga1af45a3355d75b61ece499ee8965dcf5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMBool LLVMGetBitcodeModuleInContext2 (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga9c43e01525516ff6b4feab5166c5b1da">LLVMContextRef</a> ContextRef, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga9867eaa7b17ba17405cdf2539bedb108">LLVMMemoryBufferRef</a> MemBuf, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad1d1bb5f901c903a0cf09c5a053c9c56">LLVMModuleRef</a> &#42; OutM)</>}>
Reads a module from the given memory buffer, returning via the OutMP parameter a module provider which performs lazy deserialization.

Returns 0 on success.

Takes ownership of <code>MemBuf</code> if (and only if) the module was read successfully.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/bitreader-h/#l00071">71</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/bitreader-h">BitReader.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/reader/bitreader-cpp/#l00104">104</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/reader/bitreader-cpp">BitReader.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
